ゲートを通った俺たちは、\nついにメイズ内へと降り立った。:
After passing through the gate, we finally descended into the
Mayse.
ようこそ、メイズへ！\nここは<r=ケイブ・ベルト>地穴帯</r>。いわゆる、一: Welcome to Maze! <b>This is the <r-cave belt> Earthhole belt. It's the shallowest floor, so to speak!
なんかさっきから、テンション高くないか？: Haven't you been in high spirits for a while now?
おまえが言う？\n訓練の時の変な軍曹キャラより全然マシ。:
You're saying? It's way better than the weird sergeant character from the
training.
ちゆるさんは、メイズ研究同好会を主宰していますからね。: Chiyuru-san presides over the Mayse Research Society, after all.
つまりメイズ大好きさんというわけですわ。そのぶん、知識も豊富。: In other words, she loves Mayse. She has a lot of knowledge.
でも会員は確かひとりなんだっけ？: But there's only one member, right?
しかも詳細の活動内容は不明で、ちょっと怪しいですけれど。: We don't know the details of their activities, so it's a little suspicious.
……つまりひとりでメイズに興奮してる、危ないヤツってことか。: ...In other words, she's a dangerous person who's excited about Maze all by herself.
どうして！ 知識欲がバシバシ刺激されるでしょ！？\nしかもタツミヤ鉱以外に、人間: Why?! My thirst for knowledge is being stimulated, isn't it?! And besides the <b> Tatsumiya mine, I can even mine humans!
俺を鉱石と一緒にするな！\n相当特殊なケースだろ！:
Don't lump me in with the ore!
That's a pretty special case!
ま、この階層はとっくに掘りつくされてるから、\n採掘の期待値は高くないけどね。:
Well, this floor has already been dug up, so the expected value of the
mining isn't high.
ちなみに、私たちの侵入許可は、\n<r=ケイブ・ベルト>地穴帯</r>までしか下:
By the way, our permission to enter is only limited to the
area.
ゆえに、成果を得るならば、出現するメイズシフターが\nタツミヤ鉱を貯め込んでいる:
Therefore, if we want to achieve results, the Maizsifter that appears may be storing up the
Tatsumiya Ore, so that's what we're aiming for.
ああ、そのあたりは補修で教え込まれたよ。\nそれに今回は、深入りするつもりもなか: Yeah, I was taught that through repairs. <b>And I didn't intend to get too involved this time.
お？ あんだけメイズに行きたがってたのに？\nビビっちゃった？:
Oh? Even though you wanted to go to Mayse so badly? Did you freak out
?
あの時は、俺も戦闘できるって思ってたんだよ！\n丸腰だから諦めたの！:
At the time, I thought I could fight, too! I gave up because
was unarmed!
ひとまず今日の目標は、片っ端からメイズシフターを倒しまくる。\nそれだけだ。: Today's goal is to defeat the maise shifters one by one. That's all there is to it.
俺は指揮を取らない。七彩もリーダーシップは封印だ。\nとにかく各自の自己判断に任: I won't take command. Shichika's leadership is a seal. <b>Anyway, I'll leave it up to each of you to make your own decisions.
は……はぁ！？ なんですのそれは！\n組織的戦闘をするなというのですか！？: Huh... Huh?! What's that supposed to mean?! Are you telling me not to engage in organized battle?!
おっ、よくわかってるじゃないか。\nちなみに採掘報酬は、メイズシフター撃破数に応: Oh, you get it, don't you? By the way, the mining reward will be distributed according to the number of maise shifters defeated.
ななな……！ それじゃ、協力ではなく競争をしろと？\n同じチームで！？:
Wh-Wh-What...?! So you're telling me to compete, not cooperate?
With the same team?!
……質問。ふたりで一体を仕留めた場合は？: ...Question. What if we kill one of them together?
トドメを入れた方の撃破数に加算する。\n個人戦績だけを有効とみなすぞ。:
I'll add to the number of defeats on the side that dealt the finishing blow. I'm only going to consider the personal battle record of
to be effective.
アシストは無駄骨ってことかい？\nそれはさすがに……: Does that mean the assist is a waste of time? <b>That's a bit...
ラミたちで喧嘩してもしょーがないじゃん！\nやっぱ指揮官向いてないんじゃない？:
There's no point in fighting with Rami and the others! I guess
isn't cut out to be a commander after all.
どうしてそうあなたは、チームワークを否定することばかり……: Why do you always deny teamwork...?
わ……わかりましたっ！\nとにかくいっぱいいっぱい、倒せばいいんですよね！: I... I understand! Anyway, we just have to defeat a lot of them, right?
めるさん！？\nあなた、まさか従うつもりですの！？:
Meru-san?!
Don't tell me you're going to obey?!
もちろんです！ だって%usernameusernameuserna%さんの指示: Of course! After all, %username, username, userna%-san's instructions must have some meaning!!
める、目がキマってるし。コワ～。\nフラットスピンしすぎでおかしくなっちゃった。:
I-I've got a bad eye. I'm scared~. The
flat spin is too much, and I've gone crazy.
そう……私にはフラットスピンがあります！\n%usernameusernameu: That's right... I have a flatspin! <b>%user name, username, user name, and na%-san taught me this technique...!
いきます！ エンゲージ・オフェンシヴ！\nキーーーーンッ！！:
Here I go! Engaging Ofenciv!
Keeeeen!!
と、めるはレーダーに映ったメイズシフターの群れへ向かっていく。\nだが、考え無し: With that, Meguru heads for the swarm of Mayse-Sifters on her radar. It's a <b>, but it doesn't seem like she's charging in without thinking.
フラットスピンを使った高速機動で群れに対して\n有利な位置を陣取り、地の利をうま:
They’re using high-speed maneuvers using flatspins to position themselves in a
advantage against the pack, making good use of their geographical advantage to fight.
めるにフラットスピンを仕込んだのは正解だったな。: I guess I was right to put a flat spin on it.
くっ……めるさんにだけ戦わせるわけには……！\nみなさん続いて！ 援護しますわよ:
Ugh... I can't let Meru-san fight alone...!
Everyone, follow me! I'll cover you!
援護じゃないぞー。ここからは点の取り合いをしろ！: I'm not here to back you up. From here on out, fight for points!
出遅れた４人も、メイズシフターへと突っ込んでいく。: The four of them, who had been too late, also charged at the maise shifter.
そこからの戦いは、互いに撃墜数を競い合い、\nチームとしての連携もクソもない戦い:
It goes without saying that the battle from there was a battle where both sides competed to shoot down each other, without any coordination or shit as a
team...
楽しかったけど、疲れたぁ～。全然上手くいかなかったしね……: It was fun, but I'm tired. It didn't go well at all...
そりゃあんだけ派手に衝突してりゃね。ラミもまだお尻痛いし。: That's because of that flashy clash. Rami's butt still hurts.
訓練で学んだことを活かすとか、そういう次元ではなかったですわね……: It wasn't on the level of making use of what I learned during training...
でもわたし、今回は壁とかみなさんに機体をぶつけずに済みました！: But this time, I didn't bump into the wall or anyone else!
危ないと思ったら、すっごい軌道で遠くにすっ飛んでいくんだもん。\n何アレ？: If you think it's dangerous, it'll fly off into the distance in an amazing orbit. <b>What's that?
フラットスピン……あんな動きができるんだ。: Flat spin... I didn't know she could move like that.
確かに感心しましたけれど……こんな戦い方、身も心も持ちませんわ。: I'm certainly impressed, but... I don't have a body or soul to fight like this.
いやいやホントに。いつもの数倍疲れたよ～。: No, no, seriously. I'm several times more tired than usual.
待たせたな。今デバイスに結果が届いた。\nそれぞれのタツミヤ鉱の採掘量が算出され: Sorry to keep you waiting. The results have just arrived on the device. The amount of Tatsumiya ore mined for each <b> has been calculated.
どーでもいーわー。全然倒せなかったしー。: It doesn't matter. I couldn't beat him at all.
撃破数１位は――める、お前ぶっちぎりだ。よくやったな！: First place is――Sh-Sheesh, you're a real piece of work. Good job!
あ、ありがとうございます！\nえへへ、%usernameusernameuser: Th-Thank you very much! <b> Ehehe, thanks to %user name, username, userna%-san...
報酬分配はこのくらいだ。今デバイスで送金する。\n好きに使っていいぞ。: That's about it for the reward distribution. I'll send you a transfer via the device now. Use the <b> however you like.
ありが……ええええっ！！？\nけけ、桁が間違っていませんかあ！？: Thank you... Whaaaaat!? <b>Kekekeke, isn't that the wrong number!?
いいや？ 今日の成果はほとんどめるだったからな。\n撃破数に応じた分配だって言っ:
No? Today's results were pretty much nil. Didn't I tell you that it was distributed according to the number of
defeated?
ねえ、ラミは！？ ラミはいくらだったの！？: Hey, what about Rami?! How much did Rami cost?!
待って、今送金する。……こんなもんだ。: Wait, I'll send the money now. ...This is it.
は……なにこれ！\n子どものお小遣いかっつーの！！: Hah... What's this?! It's a child's allowance!
悔しかったらもっと掘って、もっとメイズシフターを倒せ。\n明日以降も、同じ方式で:
If you're frustrated, dig more and defeat more maise shifters.
We'll dive into the maise in the same way from tomorrow onward.
これは……ちょっと本腰いれないといけないようだね。: Looks like I'll have to get serious.
